#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>
#define M 1000000007

using namespace std;

long long cnt[12];

long long C(long long n, long long r)
{
     if ( r > n ) return 0;
     if ( r == 0 ) return 1;
     if ( r == 1 ) return n;
     if ( r == 2 ) {
          long long val = (n*(n-1))/2;
          val %= M;
          return val;
     }
     if ( r == 3 ) {
          long long val = (n*(n-1)*(n-2))/6;
          val %= M;
          return val;
     }
     if ( r == 4 ) {
          long long val = (n*(n-1)*(n-2)*(n-3))/24;
          val %= M;
          return val;
     }
}

long long f(vector <int> v)
{
     long long ans = 1;
     map <int,long long> m;
     map <int,long long> :: iterator it;
     for ( int i = 0; i < (int)(v.size()); i++ ) m[v[i]]++;
     for ( it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); it++ ) {
         ans = (ans*C(cnt[((*it).first)],((*it).second)))%M;
         ans %= M;
     }
     return ans;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    string s;
    cin >> t;
    while ( t-- ) {
          cin >> s;
          long long ans = 0;
          vector <int> v;
          memset(cnt, 0, sizeof(cnt));
          for ( int i = 0; i < (int)(s.size()); i++ ) cnt[s[i]-48]++;
          for ( int i = 9; i <= 9; i++ ) {
              v.clear();
              v.push_back(i);
              ans += f(v)%M;
              ans %= M;
          }
          for ( int i = 0; i <= 9; i++ ) {
              for ( int j = i; j <= 9; j++ ) {
                  if ( i+j != 9 && i+j != 18 ) continue;
                  v.clear();
                  v.push_back(i); v.push_back(j);
                  ans += f(v)%M;
                  ans %= M;
              }
          }
          for ( int i = 0; i <= 9; i++ ) {
              for ( int j = i; j <= 9; j++ ) {
                  for ( int k = j; k <= 9; k++ ) {
                      if ( i+j+k != 9 && i+j+k != 18 && i+j+k != 27 ) continue;
                      v.clear();
                      v.push_back(i); v.push_back(j); v.push_back(k); 
                      ans += f(v)%M;
                      ans %= M;
                  }
              }
          }
          for ( int i = 0; i <= 9; i++ ) {
              for ( int j = i; j <= 9; j++ ) {
                  for ( int k = j; k <= 9; k++ ) {
                      for ( int l = k; l <= 9; l++ ) {
                          int p = (i+j+k+l);
                          if ( p != 9 && p != 18 && p != 27 && p != 36 ) continue;
                          v.clear();
                          v.push_back(i); v.push_back(j); v.push_back(k); v.push_back(l);
                          ans += f(v)%M;
                          ans %= M;
                      }
                  }
              }
          } 
          cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
